title: It Never Lasts Long
itunes:title: It Never Lasts Long
description:
I am 45 years old and have been married for 12 years. I have a very good relationship and this is the happiest I’ve ever been… except there’s one problem. My husband has issues in the bedroom and it has been going on for 5 years now. We have been to every kind of doctor and he’s tried everything. No matter what he tries, he can not last more than a minute.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
